widget.description:
Jump and fly your way through danger in this rhythm-based action platformer! "Cuberu Is a Super-Hard, Super-Fun Platform" "Cuberu provides all of the challenge expected from an “impossible” game while also making it more accessible to newcomers."
"Cuberu is a fast-paced platformer that will leave you screaming in frustration, but you’ll keep coming back for more."
"Cuberu isn't your typical rhythm-based game, it actually requires skill on top of good timing."
Prepare for a near impossible challenge in the world of Cuberu. Push your skills to the limit as you jump, fly and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles. Simple one touch game play with 3 levels that will keep you entertained for hours!
